author: hwright
msg: Deprecate svn_wc_adm_open3() in favor of its private cousin,
svn_wc__adm_open_in_context().  Also, switch all trivial usages of the old
API to the new one in libsvn_client.
There were a couple of places where making the switch introduced assertion
failures in wc_db.  It's my guess that these are due to a heterogeneous
environment of adm_open(), adm_probe() and various _in_context() versions of
the same.  Future commits will clean up the simple cases, and then look at
updating complete files after the new APIs become available.
svn_wc__adm_open_in_context() will disappear before 1.7, as will our internal
Switch calls to svn_wc_adm_open3() with svn_wc__adm_open_in_context().

author: pburba
msg: * STATUS: Remove r38458 from the approved section.

author: pburba
msg: * STATUS: *Really* add my vote approving r38458.  In a sleep-deprived
haze I managed to commit the merge rather than the vote in r38557.

author: pburba
msg: Make 'svnlook diff' show empty added or deleted files.
If we don't print any output for empty added or deleted files,
hook scripts relying on 'svnlook diff' to gather information about
files affected by a revision can get confused.
E.g. contrib/hook-scripts/enforcer is known to be affected,
it cannot enforce rules on added empty files.
Granted, this is not a very serious bug, but the fix is trivial.
